alert.note: Alert for Far South Miami-Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 2:31PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Mainland Monroe and central Miami-Dade Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 231 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Everglades National Park, or 17 miles northeast of Northwest Cape Sable, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Everglades National Park, Pa-Hay-Okee Overlook and Mahogany Hammock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Far South Miami-Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe
